casename: Info-communications Development Authority of Singapore v Singapore Telecommunications Ltd (No 2)
counsel: Davinder Singh SC, Cavinder Bull and Shirin Tang (Drew & Napier LLC) for the plaintiffs; Jules Sher QC, K Shanmugam SC, Prakash Pillai and Marcus Yip (Allen & Gledhill) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Restitution/Unjust enrichment/Money paid under mistake of law/Recovery of moneys so paid/Principles governing recovery/Whether statutory nature of payment precludes recovery/Whether mistake relates to formation of pre-existing contract or mistaken payment simpliciter/Whether there was any operative mistake existing in the circumstances of case/s 28 Telecommunication Authority of Singapore Act (Cap 323, 1993 Ed)
